job_tasks.phrase: Beheer van de Linux omgeving zowel logisch als fysiek in een hostingomgeving
job_tasks.justification: Managing a Linux environment in a hosting context relates to the operational and infrastructure aspects of software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Het ondersteunen bij de implementatie van wijzigingsverzoeken
job_tasks.justification: Supporting the implementation of change requests is a core task in software development and system management.

job_tasks.phrase: Het verhelpen van storingen in de omgeving
job_tasks.justification: Troubleshooting and resolving faults in an environment falls under operational management and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: Conform ITIL processen de werkzaamheden uitvoeren
job_tasks.justification: Adhering to ITIL processes is directly related to operations management and service delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: Het gecontroleerd uitrollen van Linux patches
job_tasks.justification: Controlled rollout of Linux patches is a standard operation for maintaining system integrity and security.

job_tasks.phrase: De kandidaat moet bereid zijn om consignatiediensten te draaien.
job_tasks.justification: Being available for on-call services is a responsibility within operations engineering to ensure system availability.

job_tasks.phrase: resultaat gedreven, aanspreekbaar, dienstverlenend, integer en ondernemend
job_tasks.justification: These are core values that describe the desired approach to business and service delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: eigenaarschap wordt getoond en er is een natuurlijke neiging om permanent te verbeteren.
job_tasks.justification: Demonstrating ownership and a drive for continuous improvement are key aspects of innovation and taking responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: De kandidaat wordt verwacht dat hij/zij zich in voorkomende situaties flexibel opstelt.
job_tasks.justification: Flexibility in situations aligns with the ability to adapt to changing circumstances and requirements.

soft_skills.phrase: natuurlijke neiging is om permanent te verbeteren

classification.rationale: This job description focuses heavily on Linux environment management, ITIL processes, and traditional infrastructure operations. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies, making it irrelevant to the GenAI Engineer profile.
